-refresh tokens

-Bug Reporting & Debugging: Built-in mechanism to simulate flaky tests and system failures.

title: Udemy Downlaoder GUI Python Tkinter
description:
-This APP for Educational Purpose.
-DRM Video Decryption: Downloads encrypted Udemy courses using Widevine L3 decryption keys with Firefox extension integration and automatic key extraction
-Modern GUI Interface: Dark-themed Tkinter application with course selection tool, chapter/lecture preview, and selective download options
-Multi-Format Support: Downloads videos, subtitles (VTT to SRT conversion), PDFs, presentations, and all course materials with automatic video/audio combining
-Advanced Download Management: Integrates aria2c for accelerated downloads, progress tracking, real-time logging, and download verification with cleanup
-Authentication & Configuration: Supports access token and cookie-based authentication with JSON configuration storage for Udemy Business and Personal accounts
-Cross-Platform Tools: Bundles ffmpeg, shaka-packager, yt-dlp with Windows batch scripts and Linux shell scripts for one-click setup and execution

title: ITI JAVA Final Project PAINT GUI
description:
A comprehensive desktop painting application built with Java Swing that provides users with professional drawing tools, shape creation, color management, and file operations - similar to Microsoft Paint but with enhanced features.
-Core Drawing Tools: Freehand pen with variable stroke width, advanced brush with opacity/texture, straight lines with angle snapping, and geometric shapes (rectangle, circle, ellipse, polygon)
-Text & Selection: Text insertion with customizable fonts and selection tool for moving/transforming drawn elements
-Color Management: RGB/HSV color picker, recent color palette, and custom color saving/loading functionality
-File Operations: Create new canvas, open/save project files, and export to multiple formats (PNG, JPEG, GIF, BMP)

Undo/Redo System: Unlimited undo/redo operations for complete workflow flexibility
-Advanced Brush Options: Opacity control and texture settings for professional-grade digital painting

title: PC, Android Web Offline Note App
description:
-Egyptian web app for organizing technical notes and project documentation with hierarchical structure (Groups → Sections → Steps)
-Supports formatted code, clickable links, images, and copy-to-clipboard commands with syntax highlighting
-Real-time search across all content with filtering by groups, sections, or steps
-Local XML export/import for offline use plus optional GitHub Gist integration for free cloud backup
-Responsive Tailwind CSS design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile with complete data privacy
-Perfect for Arabic-speaking developers needing a powerful knowledge management tool without subscription fees

title: ISTQB-Foundation-Level-V4-Summary-Web-App
description:
A simple, static website containing concise summaries for ISTQB Foundation Level v4 chapters. Open index.html in your browser to navigate to each chapter.
-Pure HTML files, no build tools or dependencies required
-Works fully offline
-Organized by chapter directories (e.g., ch1, ch2, …)
-Some chapters include multiple summary variants (e.g., chapter1-summary.html and chapter1-summary2.html)

title: Excel Duplication Finder
description:
-this is web app that lets you work offline on your PC by just double-clicking the `index.html` file. You can also use an HTTP server from Google Play.

-The app generates quick reports on any duplicate data in each column, specifying the location of each duplication, for example: "Sheet1 A12."

-I created this software to solve my colleague problem. My programming philosophy is straightforward: "If you can't solve it, code it!"

title: Excel Combiner
description:
-This web app that allows you to work offline on your PC by simply double-clicking the "index.html" file. Alternatively, you can use an HTTP server from Google Play.

-The app quickly combines two Excel sheets. If both `a.xls` and `b.xlsx` contain `Sheet1`, the extra columns from `b.xlsx` will be added after the existing columns in `a.xls`, while also overriding any duplicates.

-I developed this software to address a problem my work colleague was facing. My programming philosophy is simple: "If you can't solve it, code it!"

title: Software Testing Report & Bug Tracking Web App
description:
This is a full-stack web application designed to manage software test cases and bug reports efficiently. It features a dynamic frontend built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript for an interactive user experience, backed by a Flask API for data persistence, export functionalities, and dynamic report generation.

-Dashboard & Navigation: Summary dashboard with key metrics (pass rate, total tests, bugs) organized in tabbed interface (Summary, Test Cases, Bug Reports) with real-time search
-Data Management: Add/edit/delete test cases and bug reports, reorder items, import/export CSV, and bulk save functionality
-Test Case Features: Pagination for large datasets, status tracking (PASS/FAIL/To Be Executed), priority levels (Low/Medium/High/Critical) with dynamic visual styling
-Bug Reporting: Evidence gallery with image/video attachments and Google Drive links, zoom functionality, related test case linking, and auto-platform detection

Backend (Flask API): CSV data persistence, professional XLSX export with three sheets (Test Cases, Bug Reports, Analysis), conditional formatting, and clickable evidence hyperlinks
-Responsive Design: Tailwind CSS-based interface optimized for all screen sizes with ID validation, duplicate checking, and dynamic statistics generation
